mapper.insert: insert into QNABoard (seq, id, name, subject, content, ref) values (QNAseq.nextVal, #{id}, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, QNAseq.currVal)
mapper.select: select seq, id, name, subject, content, ref, lev, step, pseq, reply, hit, to_char(logtime, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as logtime from QNABoard order by ref desc, step asc
mapper.update: update QNABoard set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step> #{step}
update QNABoard set reply=reply+1 where seq=#{pseq}
